Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to innovation and quality. Given its unique features and unparalleled craftsmanship, we believe its true value exceeds $8000. For you, we are offering this exceptional product at a special introductory price of $12000. This exclusive opportunity is tailored to recognize your discerning taste and commitment to excellence. Don't miss out on this chance to own something truly remarkable. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
